title: Arbor Snowboards :: Shreddy Krueger - A Mountain of Terror
description: The new Shreddy Krueger is our first System Rocker design built on a performance gun shape. Don’t let this first ever set-back version of the Arbor System catch you off guard - it delivers a deadly level of versatility: bottomless powder, varied speed and terrain, steeps, trees, backcountry freestyle and more - kills it all.
tags: Arbor,Arbor Snowboards,Shreddy Krueger,Snowboarding,A Mountain of Terror,Swallow Tail,Rocket Nose,Powder Gun,Powder,Powder Stick
